project.name: Calculator Module Demo
project.description: Medium complexity: Create a calculator module with basic arithmetic operations

features.description: Create a calculator.py module with add, subtract, multiply, and divide functions
steps: Create calculator.py with four functions: add(a, b), subtract(a, b), multiply(a, b), divide(a, b)
Each function should return the result of the operation
divide() should handle division by zero gracefully by raising ValueError
